channel.title: Help me with emote tabs!
channel.description: i can change the name of the teles but what do i search for in the texthandler to change where they tele u?

item.title: Help me with emote tabs!
item.dc:creator: @Ic3_Barrage Ic3 Barrage
item.description:
@Ic3_Barrage wrote:

And also, if you do not have ::mypos, add this to your client.java

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) { sendMessage("You are standing on X=" + absX + " Y=" + absY + " Your Height=" + heightLevel); sendMessage("MapRegionX=" + mapRegionX + " MapRegionY=" + mapRegionY); sendMessage("CurrentX=" + currentX + " CurrentY=" + currentY); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with emote tabs!
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

Once as you find the case for the emote tab.
In the case you would normally put the X and Y coordinates.

teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####;

If you don’t know how to get the coordinates, type ::mypos in-game.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with emote tabs!
item.dc:creator: @Ic3_Barrage Ic3 Barrage
item.description:
@Ic3_Barrage wrote:

Huh?

Each emote has a case.
Find the cases for the emotes, by right clicking and looking at the number after the name.
And then search for “Case ###” in your Client.java
and have it look like this…

		case 162: //Text space to write in to search for this case if you forget it's case #
		teleportToX = ####;
		teleportToY = ####;
			break;

Ive said this already, so i explained it a little more this time…

Read full topic
